name: Form Within
description:
A game made for the MC game jam 2018. The theme was "This isn't even my final form".

R to restart the second level until it works.

Made by : 

  • Alexandre Lessard
  • Samuel Perreault
  • Julie Fiala
  • Felix Decarie-neault
  • Richard Rail
  • Olivier Ouellet
  • Jean-Luc Oude
  • Kwame Beke
  • Benoit l'écuyer
